eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: San Juan; Skagit; Whatcom, WA; AT 11:44 AM ON NOV 06, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:44 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Whatcom County Sheriff's Office Division of Emergency Management is conducting a test of the Emergency Alert System for Whatcom County. This is a test only and no action by the public is required. If this were a real event instructions would follow this message. This concludes the test of the emergency alert system.
